data: <col=08088A>The <col=8A0808>skiller <col=08088A>package will give you a starting point of a skiller
<col=08088A>You will receive <col=08088A>skiller items<col=08088A>, along with basic ingredients.
<col=08088A>You will also receive an <col=8A0808>XP Token<col=08088A> worth 1 million experience
